entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Pelican Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Showers over southern sections late in the afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow near midnight. Showers over southern sections early in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
